author: yperbasis
content: <@425274498732916736> <@425279588009246720> If you don't want to change the cost of `RJUMP`, please at least rectify the misleading "This is a reduction of 2 gas, compared to JUMP and JUMPI" in EIP-4200.

author: chfast
content: I don't really want to but I'm open to discuss it later. Any other open issues remains from what you reported yesterday?

author: yperbasis
content: There's one small issue in EIP-4750 where Item 8 of the `CALLF` spec is rendered as Item 1.

author: _shemnon
content: Will there be a breakout room this Thuraday?

author: big_tech_sux
content: implicit discarding of stack items (by JUMPF and RETF) seems a bit dangerous, no? first of all it's not accounted for in the gas cost (afaict). and second it makes it easy to introduce subtle bugs in user code

author: big_tech_sux
content: same with RETF not halting exceptionally if it's called from the top frame - seems like it should fail loudly

author: big_tech_sux
content: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ipsilon/eof1-checklist - gas costs is missing JUMPF btw

author: chfast
content: Gas cost should be already in the EIP.
